entry.def: Biblical means contained in or relating to the Bible.

example.ex: The community's links with Syria date back to biblical times.
example.tran: 这个团体与叙利亚的关系可以追溯到《圣经》时代。

means.word_mean: 1. of or pertaining to or contained in or in accordance with the Bible;
2. in keeping with the nature of the Bible or its times or people;
